solution_line_template: The number of tickets needed for the go-karts is {go_kart_rides} × {go_kart_cost_per_ride} = <<{go_kart_rides}*{go_kart_cost_per_ride}={go_kart_total_tickets}>>{go_kart_total_tickets}.

The number of tickets needed for the bumper cars is {bumper_car_rides} × {bumper_car_cost_per_ride} = <<{bumper_car_rides}*{bumper_car_cost_per_ride}={bumper_car_total_tickets}>>{bumper_car_total_tickets}.
